message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you're willing to negotiate.  I'm interested but I can only go up to $12500. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13750.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $13750 is still a bit high for my budget. I'm willing to go to $13000. If you're interested in closing the deal, let's meet in the middle.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'll offer it to you for $14000. This is the lowest I can go without losing too much profit.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $14000 is still more than I can comfortably pay.  How about we meet in the middle at $13500? This is a fair price for both of us and will allow us to close the deal.
I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll offer it to you for $14250. This is the best I can do without losing too much profit.

Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. While I'm getting closer to my budget, $14250 is still a bit more than I can comfortably afford. I'm willing to offer $13750. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm hopeful we can reach an agreement.

I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'll offer it to you for $14000. This is the lowest I can go without losing too much profit. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to finalize the deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to continue negotiating.  I'm really interested in this product, but $14000 is still a bit high.  I'm willing to go up to $13750. This is my final offer, as I'm reaching the limit of my budget.  If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to explore other options.
